items.sentence: Tom talks to his mother more often than he talks to his father.
How can I explain this in a way that even Tom would understand?
Tom tried to understand why he was different from other people.
The tiles that fell from the roof broke into very small pieces.
There are many videos on YouTube of people doing stupid things.
Tom politely pretended not to notice that Mary had been crying.
Tom thinks it possible for Mary to get a job with that company.
The police told Tom to come out of the house with his hands up.
Tom and Mary have to stay married for the sake of the children.
Tom had no other choice than to help Mary clean out the stable.
